name: quantconnect-mcp
description: Complete QuantConnect platform integration with AI assistants for algorithmic trading, research, backtesting, and portfolio management through MCP
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server that provides AI assistants with complete access to QuantConnect's algorithmic trading platform. Features include project management, backtesting, research notebooks, data access, portfolio optimization, and statistical analysis tools for quantitative finance.

tools.name: authenticate
tools.description: Authenticate with QuantConnect API using user credentials

tools.name: create_project
tools.description: Create new algorithmic trading projects in QuantConnect

tools.name: list_projects
tools.description: List all projects in QuantConnect account with filtering options

tools.name: get_project
tools.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific project

tools.name: update_project
tools.description: Update project settings and configuration

tools.name: delete_project
tools.description: Delete projects from QuantConnect account

tools.name: create_file
tools.description: Create new files in QuantConnect projects

tools.name: list_files
tools.description: List all files in a QuantConnect project

tools.name: get_file
tools.description: Retrieve file content from QuantConnect projects

tools.name: update_file
tools.description: Update file content in QuantConnect projects

tools.name: delete_file
tools.description: Delete files from QuantConnect projects

tools.name: create_notebook
tools.description: Create new research notebooks in QuantBook

tools.name: list_notebooks
tools.description: List all research notebooks in QuantConnect account

tools.name: get_notebook
tools.description: Retrieve research notebook content and metadata

tools.name: update_notebook
tools.description: Update research notebook content and settings

tools.name: delete_notebook
tools.description: Delete research notebooks from QuantConnect

tools.name: get_equity_data
tools.description: Retrieve historical equity price data for backtesting and analysis

tools.name: get_forex_data
tools.description: Retrieve foreign exchange rate data for currency trading strategies

tools.name: get_crypto_data
tools.description: Retrieve cryptocurrency price data for digital asset strategies

tools.name: get_options_data
tools.description: Retrieve options contract data for derivatives trading

tools.name: get_futures_data
tools.description: Retrieve futures contract data for commodities and financial futures

tools.name: calculate_statistics
tools.description: Calculate performance statistics for trading strategies and portfolios

tools.name: calculate_returns
tools.description: Calculate return metrics for assets and portfolios

tools.name: calculate_risk_metrics
tools.description: Calculate risk metrics including VaR, volatility, and Sharpe ratio

tools.name: correlation_analysis
tools.description: Perform correlation analysis between assets and portfolios

tools.name: optimize_portfolio
tools.description: Optimize portfolio weights using modern portfolio theory

tools.name: mean_variance_optimization
tools.description: Perform mean-variance optimization for portfolio allocation

tools.name: risk_parity_optimization
tools.description: Optimize portfolio using risk parity methodology

tools.name: black_litterman_optimization
tools.description: Apply Black-Litterman model for portfolio optimization

tools.name: create_universe
tools.description: Create custom asset universes for algorithmic trading strategies

tools.name: fundamental_universe
tools.description: Create universes based on fundamental data criteria

tools.name: technical_universe
tools.description: Create universes based on technical analysis indicators

tools.name: sector_universe
tools.description: Create sector-based asset universes for strategy development

tools.name: create_backtest
tools.description: Create and run backtests for algorithmic trading strategies

tools.name: list_backtests
tools.description: List all backtests for a project with filtering options

tools.name: get_backtest
tools.description: Retrieve detailed backtest results and performance metrics

tools.name: delete_backtest
tools.description: Delete backtest results from QuantConnect projects

tools.name: get_backtest_report
tools.description: Generate comprehensive backtest performance reports

tools.name: compare_backtests
tools.description: Compare performance metrics across multiple backtests

QUANTCONNECT_USER_ID.title: QuantConnect User ID
QUANTCONNECT_USER_ID.description: Your QuantConnect account user ID (numeric identifier)

QUANTCONNECT_API_TOKEN.title: QuantConnect API Token
QUANTCONNECT_API_TOKEN.description: Your QuantConnect API token for authentication

QUANTCONNECT_ORGANIZATION_ID.title: QuantConnect Organization ID
QUANTCONNECT_ORGANIZATION_ID.description: Organization ID for team accounts (optional for individual accounts)

MCP_TRANSPORT.title: MCP Transport Method
MCP_TRANSPORT.description: Transport method for MCP communication (stdio, sse, or websocket)

MCP_HOST.title: MCP Host
MCP_HOST.description: Host address for MCP server (only required for sse/websocket transport)

MCP_PORT.title: MCP Port
MCP_PORT.description: Port number for MCP server (only required for sse/websocket transport)
